creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: bustling tea house with a variety of relaxing patrons and busy servers and cooks inside; at front of scene, a group of four men carry a large, covered palanquin off to the R; behind them, another group carries a smaller, open-sided palanquin to the L
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRQ; LLQ
title: Kusatsu, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
